summary: Mobile-first web app “Ramadhan Tracker” for personal worship tracking during Ramadhan, with admin-created accounts (no self-signup), user dashboard, daily tracking modules (puasa, tilawah, murojaah, tahfidz, sedekah subuh, and sholat), rotating Islamic content slides managed by admin, downloadable progress reports (PDF/CSV), monthly progress dashboard, full admin panel for user/content management and statistics, and UI language to be Bahasa Indonesia.
architectural_notes: No public self-registration; all user accounts provisioned by admin.
Role-based access control (Admin vs User) with users restricted to their own data.
Store tracking data per user per date to support dashboard summaries, filtering, and reporting.
Separate API surfaces/permissions for admin operations vs user operations.
Default/configured Sedekah Subuh donation button should open: https://tribelio.page/site/donation/9U7UPN3Y (still admin-configurable).
Daily motivation slide content types include: tadabbur (Quran reflection), hadits, and Islamic quotes.
Bahasa aplikasi diubah menjadi Bahasa Indonesia (UI copy/label/empty state/error message).
User provided Principal ID for admin grant/bootstrapping: ezpl2-ko35d-vzh3x-badkn-2jvq4-g6epk-lgsbk-4vd5b-bpn5o-riqsb-gqe
Bahasa UI harus menggunakan Bahasa Indonesia saja untuk perubahan/fitur terbaru (termasuk loading/error/empty states).
Fitur download laporan dipusatkan pada dashboard/halaman progress bulanan saja.
known_issues: Daily motivation slides/carousel (Tadabbur, Hadith, Islamic Quote) feature is not appearing in the live app/UI despite being added.
Fitur save progress (penyimpanan progres/rekaman tracking harian) tidak berjalan.
Progres harian tidak tersimpan setelah user keluar/menutup web app; user harus menandai ulang dari awal.
User cannot access /admin on production URL (https://ramadhan-tracker-agt.caffeine.xyz/admin); admin role/permissions for the user account may not be set or recognized.
Admin access still not granted after Version 7 deployment; user still cannot access /admin on production (role assignment/bootstrap may still be failing).
UI aplikasi tidak menampilkan Principal ID pengguna, sehingga user tidak bisa memberikan Principal ID secara manual untuk proses grant role Admin.
Admin role still needs to be granted/promoted for the provided Principal ID on production: ezpl2-ko35d-vzh3x-badkn-2jvq4-g6epk-lgsbk-4vd5b-bpn5o-riqsb-gqe
Jadwal/jam sholat yang ditampilkan belum sesuai/akurat dengan jadwal sholat yang benar.
Tampilan progres harian masih bermasalah dan perlu diperbaiki.
Fitur download perlu dipindahkan agar hanya tersedia di halaman/dashboard progress bulanan.

existing_features.title: Implement authentication with admin-created user accounts only (no public self-registration), including roles (Admin, User), secure session management, and route/page access control so users can only access their own dashboard and data.
Build an Admin Panel with user management capabilities: create user accounts, edit user details, deactivate/reactivate accounts, and reset user passwords.

Implement the User Dashboard (Home) as a single mobile-first screen that shows today’s overview: fasting status, tilawah summary (surah + verse range), murojaah summary (surah + verse range), tahfidz summary (surah + verse range), charity-at-dawn (Sedekah Subuh) status, and a visual daily progress bar.
Implement per-user, per-date storage and retrieval of all tracking data (fasting, tilawah, murojaah, tahfidz, sedekah) with the ability to filter/view by date.
Create the Fasting tracking module: a simple toggle for ‘Fasting today’ (Yes/No) plus an optional note, saved for the selected date.
Create the Tilawah tracking module: input surah name and verse range (from–to), saved for the selected date.
Create the Murojaah tracking module: input surah name and verse range (from–to), saved for the selected date.
Create the Tahfidz tracking module: input surah name and verse range (from–to), saved for the selected date.
Create the Sedekah Subuh tracking module: a one-click ‘Donate now’ button that marks today/selected date as completed, and opens an admin-configurable placeholder payment link.

Add an auto-rotating daily content slide section on the dashboard with three content types: Quran reflection verse, selected hadith, and short Islamic motivation; slides rotate automatically every few seconds, and Admin can create/update these slide items.

Implement progress report download for the logged-in user as a CSV file containing day-by-day recap across the date range the user selects (at minimum: fasting status, tilawah, murojaah, tahfidz, sedekah).
Provide Admin participation statistics: a simple overview showing overall user participation/completion rates for key daily items over a selectable date range (aggregated across users).
Implement a cohesive, mobile-first ‘Islamic minimal’ visual theme (not blue/purple by default) with fast one-click interactions, and add an optional dark mode toggle that persists per device.

Update the Sedekah Subuh ‘Donate Now’ button so it opens the donation URL https://tribelio.page/site/donation/9U7UPN3Y, and remove any hardcoded placeholder donation link so the opened link is always sourced from an app setting (admin-configurable) with this URL as the default value.

Ensure the dashboard daily content carousel includes and clearly labels three slide types as: ‘Tadabbur’ (Quran reflection), ‘Hadith’, and ‘Islamic Quote’ (daily motivation), and ensure Admin content management fields map to these three slide types.
Make the Dashboard daily content carousel render a visible empty state when no daily content exists, instead of rendering nothing.
Add basic diagnostics for the daily content query failure path so the UI does not silently hide the daily content section when the fetch fails (e.g., show a small error state message in English).

Update the frontend UI language to Bahasa Indonesia for all user-facing strings across the dashboard, tracking modules, admin pages, and reports (including button labels, form labels, empty/error states, toasts, and tile/progress text).

Fix the daily tracking 'save progress' functionality so that saving any module (fasting/tilawah/murojaah/tahfidz/sedekah) reliably persists to the backend for the selected date and does not throw runtime errors when no existing Task exists yet for that date.

Implement sholat (prayer) tracking stored per-user per-date, covering: the 5 daily prayers (Fajr/Subuh, Dhuhr/Zuhur, Asr/Ashar, Maghrib, Isha/Isya) plus optional prayers (Dhuha, Tarawih, Qiyamul Lail).
Update progress reporting to correctly download a CSV using actual backend data (remove placeholder fetch to '/api/tasks-in-range') and include the new sholat fields as additional columns.
Add a new authenticated dashboard page that shows the logged-in user’s progress for a selected month as a graph, using existing per-day task data.
Add navigation to the new monthly progress page from the authenticated app shell (e.g., add a menu item in the user dropdown in the header).

Ensure all new UI strings added for the monthly progress feature follow the app’s existing localization convention (the app currently uses Bahasa Indonesia), and add appropriate loading and error states for the monthly data query.

Fix daily tracking persistence so that after a user records any daily progress (sholat, fasting, tilawah, murojaah, tahfidz, sedekah) and then closes/exits the web app (tab close, refresh, reopen), the previously saved values are reliably loaded from the backend for the same selected date (no need to re-mark from scratch).
Replace the monthly progress “bar” visualization with a line chart (SVG-based) so the monthly progress page shows a line-only chart for daily percentage progress instead of vertical bars.
Update any affected loading/error/empty UI states introduced or modified by these changes to use English user-facing text in the modified components/pages.
Improve the frontend /admin access-denied experience so non-admin users understand why they cannot access the Admin Panel and what to do next, using English user-facing text.

Ensure the frontend admin-guard logic does not incorrectly redirect while the admin-role check is still loading, to avoid false denials for real admins (use English user-facing text for any new loading/error UI introduced).

Update the Admin access-denied screen to include an English "Bootstrap Admin Access" action that is shown only when the backend reports bootstrap mode, and when clicked attempts to call `promoteToAdmin` for the currently logged-in principal.

Improve the /admin gate error handling so that if role/admin checks fail (e.g., backend trap/network error), the page shows a clear English error state and a retry action rather than only generic messaging.

Fix the /admin route guard so it does not redirect authenticated users to /login during the initial Internet Identity session rehydration/loading phase; instead, allow /admin to render AdminGatePage and show its loading state until authentication status is known.

Add a safe return-to-admin flow: when an unauthenticated user attempts to access /admin and is redirected to /login, after successful login the app must navigate back to /admin (instead of always navigating to /).

Ensure AdminAccessDeniedScreen reliably offers the bootstrap action only when bootstrap mode is available, and after a successful bootstrap promotion it re-checks admin status and allows access to the Admin Panel without requiring a hard refresh.

Add a new dashboard section that shows daily prayer times that automatically update each day based on the user-selected Indonesia timezone (WIB, WITA, WIT). The UI must let the user select the timezone and must display the day’s prayer schedule for that timezone.

Update the progress/overview area on the dashboard to also display the previous day’s recorded progress for Tilawah, Tahfidz, and Murojaah (surah + verse range) so the user can quickly see what they reached yesterday.

Enhance the existing report download feature to support choosing an export format: CSV or PDF. PDF export must be generated from the same backend task data currently used for CSV export and include the same fields currently exported in CSV (including sholat fields).

Ensure any user-facing text changed or introduced while implementing REQ-49 to REQ-51 is in English, including dashboard titles/subtitles, progress labels, empty/loading/error states, and toasts in the modified components.

Fix the prayer times calculation so displayed times are realistic and match the selected Indonesia timezone (WIB/WITA/WIT), avoiding negative/invalid values and ensuring times fall within 00:00–23:59 for the selected date.

Standardize the user-facing language to Bahasa Indonesia for the UI areas affected by this change set: Dashboard header copy, Prayer Times section labels/states, daily overview tiles, yesterday progress summary, and the report download UI.
Improve the Daily Progress (Progres Harian) component UI and behavior so it is visually consistent, handles loading/empty states, and uses the same completion rules as the shared progress utility.
Move the progress report download feature so it is available only on the Monthly Progress page, and remove it from the main Dashboard page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Authentication & role-based user management: admin-created accounts only, secure sessions, admin can create/edit/deactivate users; users access only their own data
User dashboard (home) with daily overview: puasa status, tilawah/murojaah/tahfidz summaries, sedekah subuh status, daily progress bar
Daily tracking module: Puasa (toggle yes/no + optional note) saved per date
Daily tracking module: Tilawah (surah name, ayat from–to) auto-saved per date
Daily tracking module: Murojaah (surah name, ayat from–to) saved per date
Daily tracking module: Tahfidz (surah name, ayat from–to) saved per date
Daily tracking module: Sedekah Subuh (one-click “Sedekah Sekarang” to mark today) with admin-configurable payment link placeholder
Auto-rotating daily content slides on dashboard (ayat tadabbur, hadits, motivasi); admin can update content
Download progress report per user (PDF or CSV) including daily recap of puasa, tilawah, murojaah, tahfidz, sedekah subuh
Admin panel: create users, reset passwords, view overall participation statistics, manage slide content, manage sedekah link
UI/UX: mobile-first clean Islamic minimal style, fast one-click logging, optional dark mode, date filtering, optional Ramadhan calendar view
Backend/data: per-user storage of all tracking data by date, clear DB structure, separate admin vs user APIs, production-ready MVP architecture
Ensure clear separation between admin and user backend APIs and enforce authorization checks server-side for every admin-only operation and every per-user data operation.

Ensure the backend provides at least one DailyContent record so the Tadabbur/Hadith/Islamic Quote carousel has content by default on existing deployments (e.g., seed a default entry during upgrade if none exists).
Tambahkan tracking sholat: sholat 5 waktu, Dhuha, Tarawih, dan Qiyamul Lail (tersimpan per user per tanggal dan tampil di dashboard/laporan).
Tambahkan dashboard/halaman yang menampilkan progress pengguna dalam 1 bulan dengan visualisasi grafik (monthly progress chart).
Ubah visualisasi di dashboard statistik/progress: jangan pakai bar chart (balok), gunakan line chart (chart garis) saja.

Add a secure backend mechanism to grant the Admin role to a specified Principal so the user can access /admin on production (https://ramadhan-tracker-agt.caffeine.xyz/admin). This must include a safe bootstrap path for deployments where no Admin exists yet (to prevent permanent lockout).

Fix the backend admin-bootstrap detection so `promoteToAdmin` correctly determines whether any Admin already exists, even when there are no `userTasks` entries yet (preventing permanent lockout where no one can become Admin).

Add a backend query API that allows the frontend to safely determine whether the canister is in "bootstrap mode" (i.e., no Admin exists yet), so the UI can offer a first-admin recovery action only when appropriate.

Make backend bootstrap-admin detection and promotion robust by ensuring `isAdminBootstrapAvailable()` reflects whether any Admin exists in the access-control state (not a potentially stale counter), and ensure `promoteToAdmin` only permits self-bootstrapping when bootstrap mode is truly active.

If the canister has existing deployed state, add conditional upgrade/migration logic (migration.mo) to reconcile any legacy/stale admin bootstrap tracking so production deployments cannot get permanently locked out of Admin creation.

Add a one-time, safe bootstrap seeding mechanism so that the Principal `ezpl2-ko35d-vzh3x-badkn-2jvq4-g6epk-lgsbk-4vd5b-bpn5o-riqsb-gqe` is automatically granted the Admin role on production deployments when (and only when) the canister has no Admin yet.

Fix backend Admin bootstrap detection so `isAdminBootstrapAvailable()` reflects whether any Admin exists in the access-control state (not a potentially stale counter), and ensure `promoteToAdmin` only permits self-bootstrapping when bootstrap mode is truly active.

If the canister has existing deployed state, add conditional upgrade/migration logic to reconcile any legacy/stale Admin bootstrap tracking so the canister cannot become permanently locked out of Admin creation.
Persist admin/user role assignments across canister upgrades so that Admin access does not reset after deployments.

Fix admin bootstrap detection so `isAdminBootstrapAvailable()` reflects whether any Admin exists in the persisted access-control state (not a potentially stale/reset counter) and ensure `promoteToAdmin` only permits self-bootstrapping when bootstrap mode is truly active.

Add a one-time, safe bootstrap seeding mechanism that automatically grants the Admin role to Principal `ezpl2-ko35d-vzh3x-badkn-2jvq4-g6epk-lgsbk-4vd5b-bpn5o-riqsb-gqe` on deployment/upgrade if (and only if) the canister currently has no Admin.

If the canister has existing deployed state, add conditional upgrade/migration logic to reconcile any legacy/stale admin-bootstrap tracking so production deployments cannot become permanently locked out of Admin creation.
Tambahkan jadwal/jam sholat yang otomatis ter-update setiap hari berdasarkan lokasi/zona waktu pengguna (WIB/WITA/WIT).
Di tampilan progress, tampilkan capaian hari sebelumnya untuk Tilawah, Tahfidz, dan Murojaah (surah + rentang ayat) agar user tahu progres kemarin.
Tambahkan opsi download laporan/progress dalam format PDF (selain CSV).
Fix jadwal/jam sholat agar akurat dan sesuai dengan jadwal sholat yang benar untuk timezone/lokasi yang dipilih (WIB/WITA/WIT).
Ubah/standarkan bahasa UI menjadi Bahasa Indonesia saja (termasuk label, empty/loading/error states, dan toasts) pada bagian yang terdampak perubahan terbaru.
Perbaiki tampilan progres harian, dan pindahkan fitur download laporan agar hanya ada di dashboard/halaman progress bulanan (bukan di tempat lain).
